definition[0]: staying in good condition for a long time, even if used a lot
definition[2]: if something is durable, it lasts a long time, even if it is used a lot
example[2]: These materials are used in televisions to make them more durable and more fire-resistant.
definition[3]: continuing, or continuing to be successful, for a long time
example[3]: The U.S. economy is a durable beast.
